text: John Albert Kundla (July 3, 1916 - July 23, 2017) was an American former college and professional basketball coach. He was the first head coach for the Minneapolis Lakers of the National Basketball Association (NBA). Kundla died on July 23, 2017 in Minneapolis, Minnesota at the age of 101. ==References== ==Other websites== * Coaching statistics at basketball-reference.com Category:1916 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:National Basketball Association coaches Category:Sportspeople from Pennsylvania
title: John Kundla
